game.title: The Quest for the Holy Grail
game.description: The Holy Grail is the cup used by Jesus at the Last Supper. It was later used by Joseph of Arimathea to collect the blood of Jesus as he was being crucified. It is said to have miraculous healing powers. The quest for the Holy Grail is one of the most famous quests in the world.

task.objective: The grail was hidden deep within a mysterious temple complex.
task.description: A group of scholars and priests were tasked with searching for the Holy Grail. They spent months studying ancient texts and conducting experiments to try to locate it.
